Uses of Class
Components.Abstract.PanelTree.CPanel

  • Packages that use CPanel 
    Package Description
    Components.Abstract.PanelTree
    Classes and an interface implementing a PanelTreeView component.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CPanel CPanelTreeComp.boxTree2PanelTree(CBox aBox, CTerminalDef_List aTerminalDefns)
      Recursively maps a given box tree to a panel tree using the given terminal definitions of a language.

      Gets the ith child panel in this panel.

      Returns the panel containing the panel tree.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CPanel.addChild(CPanel aPanel)
      Adds a child panel to a list of inner panels contained by this panel.
      void CPanelTreeComp.clearInc(CPanel aPanel) 
      void CPanelTreeComp.format(CBox aBox, CTerminalDef_List aTerminalDefns, CPanel aResult, int aX, int aY)
      An auxiliary method with facilities for mapping a given box tree to a panel, writing text pieces in a panel and placing the panels in their parent containers at the specified points.

      Obtain index of the specified panel within its parent Panel.
